content: In 1778, it was calculated to be about ten millions; and, by an enumeration made in 1787, the population was ascertained to be 10,409,879; and Boetticher, in his Statistical Accounts, states the population at 11 millions.
translations: ita:Nel 1778, è stata stimata di essere circa di dieci milioni e, da un'enumerazione fatta nel 1787, la popolazione è stata
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by unknown (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
